name: googledrive
title: Google Drive
description: Access and manage your Google Drive files from your bot.

fileCreated.title: File Created
fileCreated.description: Triggered when a file is created in Google Drive

id.description: The ID of the Google Drive file

parentId.description: The ID of the file that is the parent of this file. If not set, 'My Drive' is the parent

mimeType.description: The media type of the file

size.description: The size in bytes of the file

contentHash.description: The hash of the file content, or version/revision number

lastModifiedDate.description: The last modified date of the file in RFC 3339 format

items.description: A component of the path of the file. It corresponds to the name of one of it's parents.

path.description: An array of the path's components sorted by level (root to leaf)

fileDeleted.title: File Deleted
fileDeleted.description: Triggered when a file is deleted in Google Drive

id.description: The ID of the Google Drive file

folderCreated.description: Triggered when a folder is created in Google Drive

url.description: The URL used to access the file whose content will be uploaded to Google Drive

modifiedAfter.description: Filter the items modified after the given date

nextToken.description: The token to get the next page of items. Leave empty to get the first page.
